name: continuable-minimal-lisp
description: Continuable miniMAL Lisp is a miniMAL lisp implementation with suspend/resume support.

scripts.build: yarn module && yarn docs && yarn types
scripts.docs: yarn rimraf docs && parcel build index.html --out-dir docs --public-url . && yarn run nodetouch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.types: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && copyfiles -u 3 dist/types/src/*.d.ts dist && rimraf dist/types

author: Toribune Co., Ltd. (http://www.tribune.co.jp)
